title: Looking for a few signed T206 cards...
author: martyesullivan

posts.post_title: Looking for a few signed T206 cards...
posts.post_content:
I know the signed T206 forgery scandal a few years back really hurt the hobby.  That said, I collect vintage signed cards and am looking for a few signed T206 cards to add to my collection.  I'm not 100% sure what I'm looking for just yet, but I'll know it when I see it.

If you have any signed T206's that you would be willing to part with, please email me at [url]martyesullivan@yahoo.com[/url]

My best,
Marty S.
